name: CVE-2022-32591
description: In ril, there is a possible system crash due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07257259; Issue ID: ALPS07257259.
